snippet.title: Super Mario 3D World + Bowser’s Fury - Announcement Trailer - Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
Super Mario 3D World is coming to Nintendo Switch…but with a new twist! Super Mario 3D World + Bowser’s Fury will launch on February 12, 2021. Stay tuned to learn more about this title in the future.
Pre-order today:
https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/super-mario-3d-world-plus-bowsers-fury-switch/

#SuperMario3DWorld #NintendoSwitch #SuperMario

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun! https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Visit Nintendo.com for all the latest! http://www.nintendo.com/
